title: Sweetest Venom
description:
Love is the sweetest venom.
LawrenceI told her I wanted her body and not her love. I lied. RonanI fell in love with a lie... She was beauty and destruction. Kissing her was a tender song. Owning her body, a wild poem. Loving her, my downfall. But she was mine. Or so I thought.BlaireOne man offers me his love. The other, the world. I'm falling, falling, falling ... And there's no end in sight.
author: Mia Asher
